Articles.Content:
Here's the zip file with the ship (and at no extra charge the lander on top, upgraded a bit) https://app.box.com/s/tu9lppuwfrqj4stqu7iz

This is what I would consider my first showcase-ready ship. This was the result of trying to get the required altitude to get to Mun, and failing. I did however get to Mun with one of my small satellites though, even though I just smacked into it.

I've even made a video to show it off. The engine count is not including the ones on the lander up top.

What can y'all do with it?
That's a strange design. Also, I smell XP Movie Maker..
